      • create

        User create(java.lang.String name,
          java.lang.String surname,
          java.lang.String username,
          java.lang.String password,
          java.lang.String email,
          java.lang.Long roleId)
            throws InvalidValueException
        Create new user, filling in lots of data.
        Parameters:
        name - First name.
        surname - Second name.
        username - User unique name.
        password - Desired password.
        email - Unique e-mail.
        roleId - Role, null for no role.
        Throws:
        InvalidValueException - - (some of) passed parameters are broken.
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - - unhandled in hash exception.

      • update

        User update(java.lang.Long userId,
          java.lang.String name,

          java.lang.String email,
          java.lang.Long roleId)
            throws InvalidValueException
        Modify existing user. If passed parameter is null or empty, that field will be not updated.
        Parameters:
        userId - User's id, that we want to modify.
        name - New name.
        surname - New surname.
        username - New username.
        password - New password.
        email - New email.
        roleId - New role id.
        Throws:
        InvalidValueException
